summary: Five years after losing touch with a summer fling, a woman has difficulty choosing between her two suitors.
cast: Charlotte Véry|Frédéric van den Driessche|Michel Voletti|Hervé Furic|Ava Loraschi|Christiane Desbois|Rosette|Jean-Luc Revol|Haydée Caillot|Jean-Claude Biette|Marie Rivière|Claudine Paringaux|Roger Dumas|Danièle Lebrun|Diane Lepvrier|Edwige Navarro|François Rauscher|Daniel Tarrare|Eric Wapler|Gaston Richard|Maria Coin
title: Cuento de invierno
